org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Stringer

Packages that use Stringer
Package
Description
org.tquadrat.foundation.lang
Some general language extensions provided by the Foundation Library.

  • Uses of Stringer in org.tquadrat.foundation.lang

    Fields in org.tquadrat.foundation.lang declared as Stringer
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final Stringer<? super Object>
    Stringer.BASE_STRINGER
    An implementation of Stringer that produces an output that looks like that from the default implementation of Object.toString()
    static final Stringer<byte[]>
    Stringer.BYTEARRAY_STRINGER
    An implementation of Stringer for byte arrays.
    static final Stringer<Class<?>>
    Stringer.CLASS_STRINGER
    An implementation of Stringer for instances of Class.
    static final Stringer<Object>
    Stringer.DEFAULT_STRINGER
    A generic Stringer implementation that delegates to Objects.toString(Object).
    static final Stringer<File>
    Stringer.FILEOBJECT_STRINGER
    An implementation of Stringer for instances of File.
    private final Stringer<T>
    GenericStringConverter.m_Stringer
    The stringer.
    static final Stringer<? super Object>
    Stringer.OBJECT_STRINGER
    A Stringer implementation that calls String.format( "%s", o ) for an object o if that implements the interface Formattable, otherwise it delegates to Objects.toString(Object).
    static final Stringer<? super Object>
    Stringer.OBJECTCLASS_STRINGER
    An implementation of Stringer that returns the name of the object's class instead of a representation of the object's value.
    static final Stringer<Optional<?>>
    Stringer.OPTIONAL_STRINGER
    An implementation of Stringer for instances of Optional.
    static final Stringer<String>
    Stringer.STRING_STRINGER
    An implementation for Stringer for instances of String.
    static final Stringer<URL>
    Stringer.URL_STRINGER
    An implementation for Stringer for instances of URL.
